sex.Description: sex of the participant as reported by the participant

ethnicity_self_report.Description: Ethnicity of the participant as reported by the participant

ethnicity_coded.Description: Ethnicity of the participant, categorised based on ethnic group classifications from the 2021 UK Census - https://www.ons.gov.uk/census/census2021dictionary/variablesbytopic/ethnicgroupnationalidentitylanguageandreligionvariablescensus2021/ethnicgroup/classifications - Note that where participants were not specific enough about their ethnic group, we have added an Unspecified category.

Levels.Asian, Asian British or Asian Welsh: Ban: Asian, Asian British or Asian Welsh: Bangladeshi
Levels.Asian, Asian British or Asian Welsh: Chi: Asian, Asian British or Asian Welsh: Chinese
Levels.Asian, Asian British or Asian Welsh: Ind: Asian, Asian British or Asian Welsh: Indian
Levels.Asian, Asian British or Asian Welsh: Pak: Asian, Asian British or Asian Welsh: Pakistani
Levels.Asian, Asian British or Asian Welsh: Oth: Asian, Asian British or Asian Welsh: Other Asian
Levels.Asian, Asian British or Asian Welsh: Uns: Asian, Asian British or Asian Welsh: Unspecified
Levels.Black, Black British, Black Welsh, Carib: Black, Black British, Black Welsh, Caribbean or African: African
Black, Black British, Black Welsh, Caribbean or African: Caribbean
Black, Black British, Black Welsh, Caribbean or African: Other Black
Black, Black British, Black Welsh, Caribbean or African: Unspecified
Levels.Mixed or Multiple ethnic groups: White a: Mixed or Multiple ethnic groups: White and Asian
Mixed or Multiple ethnic groups: White and Black African
Mixed or Multiple ethnic groups: White and Black Caribbean
Levels.Mixed or Multiple ethnic groups: Other M: Mixed or Multiple ethnic groups: Other Mixed or Multiple ethnic groups
Levels.White: English, Welsh, Scottish, Norther: White: English, Welsh, Scottish, Northern Irish or British
Levels.Other ethnic group: Any other ethnic gro: Other ethnic group: Any other ethnic group

bp_systolic.Description: systolic blood pressure of the participant

bp_diastolic.Description: diastolic blood pressure of the participant

alcohol.Description: amount of alcohol consumed by the participant in an average week
